column2: All Fimir Mearghs are acomppained by a noxious mist that demoralises and poisons their enemies. Skattach is no exception.
The caster opens a rift into the Realm oF Chaos and binds a pack of Bloodletters to their will.

At the tip of this magical staff rests an ancient Fimir artifact known as "Balor's Eye" a magically preserved eye said to belong to the myterious Fimir god, able to open a rift into the Realm of Chaos and suck all of the user's enemies within.
